document.full_text: christian karl gerhartsreiter had posed as a member of the wealthy rockefeller clan, served prison time for kidnapping his daughter and been the subject of a made-for-tv movie.
document.title: prosecutors charge rockefeller imposter with 1985 murder
lines_and_colors: christian karl gerhartsreiter had posed as a member of the wealthy rockefeller clan, served prison time for kidnapping his daughter and been the subject of a made-for-tv movie.
